DOC.HEAD: Excerpts From Communique on Proposals For Future Government
With AM-Romania, Bjt
DOC.TEXT: Excerpts from a communique read on Romanian TV on Friday night by a member of the National Salvation Committee, the temporary government, on planned reforms: _ Free elections by April. _ Commitment to a pluralistic society. _ Continued membership in the Warsaw Pact. _ Commitment to the idea of a ``common European home.'' _ Abolishment of all structures of the Ceausescu dictatorship. _ Placement of the army under the control of the civil government, and placement of the security apparatus under the army.
